pageTitle: Ella Moss Hannah Lace Blouse | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 22in / 56cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Dry clean. Lining: 100% micromodal. Shell: 100% nylon. Fabric: Slinky lace. A delicate lace blouse from Ella Moss with a timeless, elegant look. Ruching adds a hint of texture, and a buttoned keyhole closes the back. Sheer yoke and long sleeves. Nude-lined body.
